snippet.title: Amber Heard is Getting Sued for $10 Million | Splash News TV
snippet.description:
Amber Heard is reportedly getting sued for $10 million for her part in an alleged conspiracy to sabotage the drama, London Fields. A production company – Nicola Six – which is named after Heard’s character in the film, sued Amber along with the movie’s director for breach of contract because they refused to shoot the agreed upon script and failed to show up at the Toronto International Film Festival to promote the film. 

Subscribe now for the latest Daily Hollywood Celebrity Splash TV News: https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

Best Daily Splash News Daily Celebrity Playlist: https://goo.gl/QsxT0r

It appears Amber Heard has found herself in legal trouble.

According to reports, the actress is being sued for 10 million dollars for her part in an alleged conspiracy to sabotage the drama London Fields. 

Here’s what’s happening:

A production company – Nicola Six – which is named after Heard’s character in the film, sued Amber along with the movie’s director for breach of contract because they refused to shoot the agreed upon script and failed to show up at the Toronto International Film Festival to promote the film. 

The suit reportedly claims that ‘while the inherent tension between actors and directors and producers are nothing new in Hollywood, the unauthorized and unlawful acts of Heard and others – notably their campaign to the picture and the picture’s investors – are perhaps unprecedented’.

It goes on to allege that Heard refused to act in provocative scenes… meaning key scenes in the movie had to be removed or rewritten to accommodate her behavior.

There has been no response from Amber.
